kiya hari hati therum ganimata nohakiwa pawiddehi kalakiri gihi bawata pathwime adahasin siti pawiddanta pawiddehi nawatha sitha alawa wasaya kirimata hakiyawak labena lesatath, gramawasi, aranyawasi nawaka, madhyama, sthawira sama awasthawakama pahasuwana bhikshun wahanselata sakayen thorawa, nodath mahanakama karagena yana haki aakarayatath, bhikshun wahansela wisin kala yuthu winayakarma itha pirisudu lesa kukus athi nowana paridden kirimata haki ayuren, dharma kathikayanan wahanselata deshana kirimata awashya daham karunu niwaradiwa pahasuwen soyagena hondin dharmadeshana kirimata pahasuwana lesatath, epamanak da nowa me poth pela kiyawimen anya aagamikayan pawa budu dahama walanda ganna thaththwayata pathwimata samath wana lesatath me poth liya atha.“lakdiwa thai්ranikaya ma bhikshun wahanselata winaya danuma sandaha bhawitha karana winaya poth unwahanselage ath poth bawata pathwa atha.

wi wagawa thulin jathika nishpadanayata laba di athi dayakathwaya siyayata 3.7 ki.athireka aahara bhoga siyayata 6k da, elawalu siyayata 10k da, palathuru siyayata 5kda rathulunu wagawa siyayata 29.4kda jathika nishpadithayata laba dimata puththalama disthrikkaya samath wi atha.me sandaha aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya, krushikarma amathyanshaya, athulu amathyansha gananawak sakriya lesa gowi mahathun ha sambandha wi atha. 2010 – 2011 wasare di maha kannaye akkara 50045k waga kara thibe. 2011 wasare yala kannaye waga kala bim pramanaya akkara 43294 ki.metharam bhumi pramanayak waga karalimata eksath janatha nidahas sandhana rajaya laba dena pohora sahanadharaya da behewin iwahal wi thibe. 2010 / 2011 wasarawala maha kannaya waga karalima sandaha rajaya pohora metrik ton 9000k laba di thibena athara rata thula godanangu samakami wathawaranayath krushikarmanthaya nanwalimata da iwahal wi atha.wi wagawa menma puththalama disthrikkaya pura jathika nishpadithayata sakriyawa dayaka wana pol saha kaju nishpadanaya da behewin ihala gos thibe.2011 wasare pol gedi miliyana 318k laba ganimata haki wi athi athara eya jathika nishpadithayata laba dun siyayata 11.32ka dayakathwayaki.

pujya rambaukana siddhartha swaminwahanse rachanayen dayaka wuwa sema, beg mastar ohuge layanwitha hadin sinhala githaya poshanaya kala.
digana pradeshaye athi wunu sinhala – muslim gatuma sambandhayen 129 polisiyen athadanguwata ganu labuwa.
ape rate krushikarmanthayata diriyak sapayiya yuthuyi wisheshayen api mun ata wani bhogayak pitaratin aanayanaya kala yuthu naha.

kese namuth kuwet parlimenthu manthriwarun adala thiranaya sambandhayen ella karana lada pidanaya hethuwen badu ayakirim kal damimata siduwuwath kuwet siwil guwan sewa adhikariya niwedanaya kara aththe elambaena aprel masa sita mema badu aya kirima sidukarana bawayi.

wilawun aushadha ha upakarana panatha thawath udaharanayaki.abhyanthara welendama pilibanda komasaris departhamenthuwa, jathika aushadha thathwa palana adhikariya, kirum – minum departhamenthuwa, shri lanka pramithi aayathanaya wani paribhogika aarakshanaya sandaha rujuwa kriya karana rajya aayathana gananawak da thibina.
kalen kalata mach, paksha athara gatum, jana wargika prashna, aagam wada…
